long_description: Each Clif Builder's Max protein bar contains 30g of a blend of whey, soy and casien protein to promote muscle growth throughout the day and muscle recovery after a hard workout. Each bar contains 15 vitamins and minerals, including calcium, iron, magnesium and vitamins A, C and E, to support protein metabolism. Bar also contains 40g of carbohydrates; eating carbohydrates and protein together after a workout helps replenish your energy stores and rebuild muscle tissue. Contains no artificial flavors, trans fat or artificial sweeteners, such as maltitol or sucralose. Choose from 3 great flavors. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Each Clif Builder's Max protein bar contains 30g of a blend of whey, soy and casien protein to promote muscle growth throughout the day and muscle recovery after a hard workout.
